settings.title: Shipping & Returns
settings.text: Please refer to our dedicated Shipping & Returns page.

settings.title: Will your scrub caps fit me?
settings.text: Yes! Our standard caps fit heads from XS to XL, and our XL+ caps can stretch much larger.

settings.title: Would your scrub caps fit a really big watermelon?
settings.text:
What a bizarre question. But, okay, let‚Äôs logic it out:¬†

We designed XL+ caps to cover long thick hair. They stretch up to 73cm.

Thanks to a sneaky measure-mission at our local supermarket, we can confirm that a watermelon with a 73cm circumference is pretty darn big.¬†

So yes! Our scrub caps can cover a really big watermelon.¬†

settings.title: I have long hair. Will it fit inside your scrub cap?
settings.text:
We designed our caps to cover long hair in a bun ‚Äî none of this ponytail-dangling-out-the-back business with Dr. Woof!¬†

At the back of each scrub cap, you‚Äôll find a special elastic band. The band allows the cap to stretch over a large hair bun, and still tie snuggly against your head.¬†

Our standard scrub caps stretch up to 64cm. This is suitable for medium-length hair in most cases.¬†

We made the XL+ scrub cap for long thick hair. It stretches up to an impressive 73cm! That‚Äôs 7XL in hat sizes.

settings.title: What size scrub cap should I get?
settings.text:
There are two sizes, standard and XL+. If you‚Äôre not sure which one you need, the best option is to measure your head. Here‚Äôs how:

STEP 1: Tie your hair in a bun (if necessary.) When you wear our caps, you should position your bun just below the crown of your head. But, for measuring only, we suggest tying your bun lower ‚Äî roughly in line with your nose.

STEP 2: Measure the circumference of your head, including your hair.¬†

STEP 3: Select a size. Standard XS‚Äì XL is suitable for up to 62cm. XL+ is suitable for up to 73cm.

settings.title: How do I put my scrub cap on?
settings.text:
Instructions for short hair: ¬†

1. Position the scrub hat on your head.

2. Pull the sides of the cap down firmly while you fasten the ties at the back.

Instructions for medium and long hair: ¬†

1. Tie your hair in a bun just below the crown of your head.

2. Position the scrub hat on your head. Make sure the cap‚Äôs elastic band sits underneath your bun.¬†

3. Pull the sides of the cap down firmly while you fasten the ties at the back.¬†

Having trouble? Here‚Äôs a video to help you out.

[R3a3F2mQUDg]

settings.title: My hair will not fit in the scrub cap. What should I do?
settings.text:
Before you panic, check you‚Äôve put your bun in the right place.

‚Ä¢ If you can‚Äôt pull the cap down fully onto your head, the bun is probably too high.

‚Ä¢ If your hair is poking out the back of the cap, the bun is probably too low.¬†

settings.title: What are your scrub caps made of?
settings.text: Our scrub caps are 100% cotton. That‚Äôs what makes them so cosy and soft.

settings.title: How do I wash my scrub cap?
settings.text:
Regular machine wash with like colours in temperature no higher than 40C/104F.

Hang dry only. Our caps are 100% cotton, which means they can shrink in the dryer.

settings.title: The scrub cap I wanted is out of stock. Will it be back?
settings.text:
We can't give an ETA on restocks. But, we can make sure you're the first to know when one takes place.

Go to the product page and use the EMAIL WHEN AVAILABLE button to request a back in stock email.

settings.title: Will your face masks fit me?
settings.text: Yes. Our masks are one-size-fits-all.

settings.title: What are your face masks made out of?
settings.text:
Cumulus Knitted Face Masks: 68% Rayon, 17% Nylon, 2% Lycra 13% Bioserica.¬Æ Bioserca¬Æ is a natural fabric scientifically proven to kill bacteria.

Circios face masks: Two layers of 100% cotton and one layer of polyester.

settings.title: I want my mask to have a good seal. How do I fit it?
settings.text:
There are two steps:¬†

1. Use the adjustable earloops to pull the mask tightly around your face.¬†

2. Bend the metal nose bridge to create a snug fit around your nose.

settings.title: What is PM 2.5?
settings.text: PM2.5 particles are over 100x thinner than a strand of hair. You can find them in smoke and smoke polluted air. PM2.5 particles are dangerous to breathe in. Luckily, PM2.5 filters catch most of them.

settings.title: Are your masks medical grade?
settings.text: No. Our masks are for everyday wear.

settings.title: How often should I change the PM 2.5 filter?
settings.text: It depends on where you are and how often you are using the filter.¬† At the very least, we suggest changing the filter once for every 12 hours of use.

settings.title: How do I clean my mask?
settings.text: Hand wash in warm water, or machine wash in a delicates bag. Air dry only.

settings.title: How big are your charms?
settings.text: Our charms are around 25mm x 25mm. If you don‚Äôt have a ruler nearby ‚Äî that‚Äôs around the size of a bottle cap.

settings.title: What are your charms made of?
settings.text:
Our charms are 100% copper with nickel electroplating for durability.

Important note:¬†We choose nickel plating because stethoscopes get banged around a lot. Nickel is incredibly strong and durable. However, it can cause allergies and other issues for some people. Nickel is not recommended for wear directly on the skin.

settings.title: I am allergic to nickel, can I wear your charms?
settings.text:
Our charms are not intended to come into prolonged contact with the skin. When placed correctly, they would spend most of the day sitting on top of your scrubs, lab coat or work clothes.¬†

Even so, we do not recommend our charms for people with a nickel allergy.

settings.title: How do I attach the charm to my stethoscope?
settings.text:
1. Slip the Dr. Woof stethoscope cuff around your stethoscope tubing.

2. Position the cuff towards the top of the tubing, just below where the earpieces branch out.

3. Squeeze the cuff shut and clip on your charm.

[kFEiUsh45Lk]

Once you‚Äôve attached the charm, make sure that you have positioned it correctly. There are two tests to do.

TEST ONE: Put the stethoscope on. Hold the bell against your chest. Make sure there is no interference with auscultation. If interference occurs, loosen the cuff, slide it further away from your stethoscope bell, and re-tighten.

TEST TWO: Hang the stethoscope around your neck sideways and then by the earpieces. Make sure the charm sits comfortably on top of your scrub uniform.

settings.title: Where do I attach the charm to my stethoscope?
settings.text:
Place the charm on the tubing of the stethoscope, just below where the earpieces branch off.

(Click to see image)

settings.title: Can I attach more than one charm to my stethoscope?
settings.text: Yes. You can clip multiple charms to a Dr. Woof stethoscope cuff. You can also put multiple Dr. Woof cuffs on your stethoscope.

settings.title: Do your charms interfere with auscultation?
settings.text: No. When the charm is attached in the correct position, there is no interference.

settings.title: Are your charms suitable for healthcare workers in high-risk areas?
settings.text: Check with your workplace. Our charms are easy to clean and disinfect. But, this does not mean that every workplace will allow them.

settings.title: I don‚Äôt carry a stethoscope. Can I attach the charm somewhere else?
settings.text:
Yes. You can attach the charm to bags or keys. It comes with a ring to help you do this.¬†

Please note that our charms are not jewellery, and you should not wear them in direct contact with the skin.

settings.title: Are your scrubs true to size?
settings.text:
Yes. A vast majority of the people who buy our scrubs are happy with the fit.

If you are not sure what size to get, the best option is to compare your measurements to the measurements on our sizing chart.

settings.title: What size am I?
settings.text:
Check our sizing chart to find your size.

Women
Men

settings.title: Do you have petite and tall sizes?
settings.text:
Yes. Our scrub pants come with different inseam options.

Use our sizing tables to find your perfect fit:

Women
Men

settings.title: How do I care for my Dr. Woof Scrubs?
settings.text:
Scrubs: Cold machine wash inside-out. Tumble dry low.¬†

Underscrubs: Cold machine wash inside-out. Tumble dry low.¬†

settings.title: Will you be offering more sizes & colours soon?
settings.text:
Yes. Our range is always expanding.

Join our mailing list for announcements.

settings.title: Why doesn't my scrub top have pockets?
settings.text:
Our 3-Pocket Scrub Top has safety stitching on the pockets ‚Äî like you see on designer suits.

The first time you use the top, you'll need to snip the pockets to open them up.

settings.title: What are your vests filled with?
settings.text: As you might expect, the 50 Down vest is filled with 50% Down. This mixed with 50% waterfowl feather.

settings.title: Are your vests waterproof?
settings.text: The vest outer is 100% nylon. This is water resistant and wipes down eaily.

settings.title: Will you have a vegan outerwear option?
settings.text: Yes. We have fleece vests and jackets launching in 2022.

settings.title: How do I care for my vest?
settings.text:
The Featherlight 50 Down Vest wipes down easily & can be spot cleaned using warm water or any neutral detergent.¬†

For thorough cleaning: Handwash¬†in water¬†up to 40¬∞ with a neutral detergent. Then rinse in clean water. Compress the jacket to get the water out - wringing or twisting will damage the down¬†.

settings.title: What size am I?
settings.text:
Our vests are sized to match our scrub-tops and underscrubs. So if you know your Dr. Woof top size... you're away laughing.

If you are not sure of your top size, you can check our size guide:

Men's
Women's

settings.title: Do you offer embroidery?
settings.text:
Yes. We can add embroidery to all of our clothing for you.

Our service is fully customisable. We have a huge range of colours, fonts and designs available. We can even embroider clinic logos and personal artwork.

Email our team to get a quote

settings.title: How do I add embroidery to my order?
settings.text:
Embroidery cannot be ordered online.

To allow full customisation, our team will talk with you to organise your order.

Contact us today to get started.

settings.title: How long does embroidery take?
settings.text: It depends on what you‚Äôd like embroidered. Please allow 2‚Äì3 extra weeks for embroidered items to arrive.

settings.title: What embroidery colours, fonts and font-sizes can I choose from?
settings.text:
Our service is fully customisable.

Unlike other scrubs embroidery services, you are not limited to two or three options. You can select the
design that is right for you.

Contact us today to organise your order.

settings.title: Do you embroider logos and artwork?
settings.text:
Yes! Show us your design and we‚Äôll make sure it is embodiable. If it is, we‚Äôll organize a quote.

Please note: for logos and artwork, there will be a fee to set up the embroidery plate. This fee will only apply once, no matter how many garments you decide to get your design added to.

Contact us today to discuss your design.

settings.title: Can I add embroidery to a team or bulk order?
settings.text: Yes!¬† Talk to the Dr. Woof¬† team member who is looking after your order. They‚Äôll confirm prices for you.

settings.title: Where on my scrubs can I place embroidery?
settings.text:
Tell us where you want it! Our service is fully customisable. You are not limited to left or right chest.

Contact us today to organise your order.

settings.title: Help! I clicked checkout and the price increased!
settings.text:
Good news! It‚Äôs not a sudden price increase, it‚Äôs a currency change.¬†

We‚Äôre an Aussie store. You can browse our store in tonnes of currencies. But, for certain orders we will require you to checkout in Aussie Dollars (AUD).

settings.title: Why is there no free shipping option?
settings.text:
We offer free shipping to Australia, NZ and Asia on all orders over $80 AUD

For orders to all other locations, please visit our US store.

If you have spent over $80 AUD and free shipping is not showing:

1. Check you‚Äôre looking at the order value in AUD.

2. Check you‚Äôve used the correct country in your address.

3. Contact us: hello@drwoofapparel.com.au.

settings.title: My promo code is not working.
settings.text:
If your promo code is not working:

1. Check you entered the code correctly.

2. Make sure you‚Äôve met the terms.

3. Contact us: hello@drwoofapparel.com.au.

*All codes are not applicable during a promotional period or if you have qualified for a Bundle Deal.

settings.title: Where do I enter my promo code?
settings.text:
Enter your promo code in the box at checkout.

If you are browsing on mobile, you will need to click 'show order summary' to find the promo code box.

The promo code box will not display on orders that are ineligible for a discount. For example, orders that qualify for a bundle deal.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.text: We accept VISA, AMEX, Mastercard, Stripe, Google Pay, Apple Pay, Paypal and Klarna.

settings.title: Is your payment method secure?
settings.text: Yes. Our payments are processed by Paypal or Stripe. They are both secure and reliable payment providers.

settings.title: Do you have Afterpay or a similar payment option?
settings.text: We have Klarna. Klarna allows you to split your order into four payments. Visit the Klarna FAQ for more info.

settings.title: How do you protect my details?
settings.text: Check out our privacy policy.

settings.title: Do you offer a bulk discount?
settings.text: Yes. Visit our corporate gifting and bulk order page for more details. Or, contact our team.

settings.title: Do you sell wholesale?
settings.text: Yes, but we‚Äôll need to have a chat first. Contact us to organise a time.

settings.title: Can you do custom designs and embroidery?
settings.text: Yes. Visit our corporate gifting and bulk order page for more details. Or, contact our team.

Because they‚Äôre comfy and they make you smile.

Sorry. This one‚Äôs not a joke ‚Äî it‚Äôs more of a fun fact.

settings.title: Are you looking for ambassadors?
settings.text: Yes we are always looking to work closely with healthcare influencers across all disciplines! Doctors, Nurses, Dentists, Veterinarians, and more!¬†Click this link to learn more.

settings.title: TIME TO SHOW OFF THE PERSON BEHIND THE SCRUBS
settings.text:
As healthcare workers, we go out of our way to make patients feel seen and heard. But who‚Äôs doing the same for us?

ROUNDS shines a light on the people behind the scrubs. We want to know what makes you laugh, what makes you cry, what makes you burst with excitement, and what makes you shake with rage?

settings.title: Want to be in the next video?
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to tell a story, explain a detail about your product, or describe a new promotion.

settings.title: MEDICAL WEAR BY MEDICAL WORKERS
settings.text:
Have you ever stopped mid-shift, adjusted your sweaty, scratchy scrub uniform, and thought:

"Whoever designed this thing, has never worn scrubs."

Us too! At Dr. Woof, our scrubs are everything scrubs should be. They are soft as heaven. They're comfy as hell. They make you smile - because every healthcare worker on earth deserves a smile.

settings.title: Image with text
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to tell a story, explain a detail about your product, or describe a new promotion.

settings.code:
Hello & Welcome

We're Ron, Dave and An ‚Äî the oddball group of Aussie healthcare workers behind Dr. Woof scrubs.

We're a pretty light-hearted bunch. But, we're going to put our serious scrub caps on for a moment and tell you about why we created Dr. Woof.

Our Story

In university, we got sick of hearing statistics about stress and burnout in medical fields. In our medical careers, we got sick of seeing those statistics play out on the faces of our friends and colleagues. And, we got sick of seeing them in the mirror too.

To us, Dr. Woof is more than a brand of scrubs. It's a way for us to make the medical world smile.

Our goal is to create medical apparel that is a joy to look at and a joy to wear. We can't take the heartbreak out of medicine, but through comfortable, functional and playful designs we can bring little pops of joy into the everyday life of the people who wear our brand.

settings.title: OUR PRODUCTS
settings.text:
We want you to feel like you're wearing a cosy tracksuit and look like you've stepped out of a fashion magazine. Everything we make is functional, breathable and soft. It's also

Inclusive ‚Äî because no one likes to see their colleagues left out.¬†

Fun ‚Äî every time you wear it, you‚Äôve got at least one little reason to smile.

settings.title: OUR COMMUNITY
settings.text:
In 2020 the world realised how smart and dedicated healthcare workers are. One thing they haven't realised yet ‚Äî we're also hilarious.

Our community ‚ÄîThe Woof Pack ‚Äî make us snort with laughter. Every. Single. Day.

settings.title: #OPERATION WOOF
settings.subheading: Our mission to make the medical world smile

settings.title: Mission Objectives
settings.title_1: Make medical uniforms that area¬†JOY¬†to look at and a¬†JOY¬†to wear.
Connect medical professionals from all areas of the healthcare universe.
settings.title_2: Support causes that the medical community cares about.

settings.subtitle: ARTIST COLLAB
settings.title: The powerhouse of our scrub cap collection
settings.text: Meet Sumana Mahata, BS. She‚Äôs an artist, future doctor and creator of the coolest science prints you‚Äôll ever see. Her work includes a mask worn by Dr. Fauci, and this super cute mitochondria scrub cap design.

settings.subtitle: Artist Collab
settings.title: Talk about WOOF
settings.text: When we asked vet and artist Dr. Leatrize to design a cap for #OperationWoof's Made by Medical collection, she really took the Woof part to heart.

settings.subtitle: ARTIST COLLAB
settings.title: Step Back in Time with Dr. Emma Cheng
settings.text: Meet Vintage Medical ‚Äî the newest cap in our The Med Life collection designed by doctor and artist Dr. Emma Cheng.

settings.subtitle: Community
settings.title: Guide to the Healthcare Universe
settings.text: Here it is! Your chance to spy on colleagues from all areas of healthcare, learn their secrets and get their best advice.

settings.subtitle: NEW CAUSE
settings.title: The Got Your Back Stethoscope Charm
settings.text: This quirky koala and her joey give our nature-loving community a laid-back way to start conversations about wildlife protection. $5 from every sale goes to Vets For Compassion.

settings.subtitle: Artist Collab
settings.title: Wildly Talented
settings.text: Meet the amazing healthcare workers who designed our latest collection: The Wild Life.

settings.subtitle: NEW CAUSE
settings.title: A scrub cap worth squawking about
settings.text: We worked with ten clucking awesome members of the exotic vet community to create SQUAWK ‚Äî a glorious avian scrub cap that gives 10% of sales to The Macaw Society.

settings.subtitle: Artist Collab
settings.title: It's anatomical ... almost
settings.text: Welcome to the surreal and delicious world of Lauren Squires ‚Äî doctor, artist and the creator of Almost Anatomical, the latest cap in our #OperationWoof collection.

settings.subtitle: Community Collab
settings.title: Count Backwards From 10
settings.text: We joined forces with Dr. David Convissar of¬†CBF10¬†to create the ultimate sugar-skull scrub cap for anaesthesiologists. 10% of its sales will go to Heart to Heart International.

settings.subtitle: NEW CAUSE
settings.title: Woof X Fairy Floss Friday
settings.text: Who doesn't love fairy floss? It's puffy, it's fluffy, and it helps our friends at Fairy Floss Friday to shine a light on mental illness in the medical community.

settings.subtitle: Artist Collab
settings.title: Dental Damn!
settings.text:
Meet Just Flossing By the first cap in our collection to be designed by an Artist in the medical community.

Just Flossing By was created by Noor or @justflossingby. We think you can guess what field she is in!

settings.code:
Who should we work with next?

Our mission is to make you smile. If there's a cause you want us to support, a colleague you want us to interview, or a creator you'd like us to spotlight, don't be shy. We'd love to hear from you.

settings.title: A 100% Cotton CUDDLE FOR YOUR SKULL
YOUR NEW GO-TO SCRUB UNIFORM
settings.text_1: Our scrubs are 20% rayon, 6% spandex, and so cosy soft you'll want a second pair for bedtime.
settings.text_2: Goodbye scratchy, sweaty scrub uniforms. Hello breathable, sweat-wicking fabric with 4-way stretch.
settings.text_3: Iron man? 100k ultra-run? Pfft. We tested our scrubs on the most extreme event known to man‚Äî a Friday night on-call shift.

Soft but hardcore.

settings.title: YOUR LONG-SHIFT SECRET WEAPON
settings.text_1: Our underscrubs are 95% fine cotton, 5% spandex and so snuggly-soft you won't want to stop petting them.
settings.text_2: They're thick enough to fight the fiercest air-con, but breathable enough to keep you cool when the pressure is on.
settings.text_3: Avoid long-shift robot syndrome! We put a pop of personality under your scrubs to make you smile and remind you you're human.

settings.title: Why you'll love this
settings.title_1: Snuggly soft at clock in,  clock out and for every second in between.
settings.title_2: 95% fine cotton ‚Äî more breathable than regular cotton (which is already pretty darn breathable!)

settings.title_1: 5% Spandex ‚Äî when you move it's moves, just like that.
settings.title_2: If you want a second one to wear at home, you won't be the first!

settings.title: #OPERATIONWOOF
settings.text: In 2022, our mission to make the medical world smile kicked into high gear. We introduced you to interesting people in the medical community, released new caps by medical artists and are getting ready to launch new projects in support of YOUR favorite charities.
